name: TextDrawAlignment
notes: If the textdraw is already shown, it must be re-shown (TextDrawShowForAll/TextDrawShowForPlayer) to show the changes of this function.
description: Set the alignment of text in a text draw.

params_body.name: Text:text
params_body.description: The ID of the textdraw to set the alignment of.

return_values:
Note

For alignment 2 (center) the x and y values of TextSize need to be swapped, see notes at TextDrawTextSize, also position coordinate become position of center of textdraw and not left/top edges.
